item.title: Hawkeye, Volume 2: Little Hits
item.description:
Clint is in over his head. Again. Tracksuit mafia. Managing a building. Installing AV equipment. Valentine’s Day. Women.

The dog gets it.

Poor Gil . :/

It’s a neat story, if somewhat incomplete.

Onward!
